solution_line_template: Tony's age now is {jacob_age_now} / {half_divisor} = <<{jacob_age_now}/{half_divisor}={tony_age_now}>>{tony_age_now} years old.
In {years_from_now} years he will be {tony_age_now} + {years_from_now} = <<{tony_age_now}+{years_from_now}={tony_age_future}>>{tony_age_future} years old.
